column1: :Old Noakes is present at the Gaffers conversation
column2: though the setting is moved from the Ivy Bush to the Green Dragon. He is played by William Johnson.

column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:

column2: Decipher identifies a different Hobbit from Bilbos Party as Old Noakes.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
:Old Noakes sits on a bench just beyond Bywater. Sancho Proudfoot stole his medicinal herbs; retrieving them is a side mission.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
